name: Giveaway Scout
overview:
GiveawayScout helps frugal consumers find the best and latest deals, coupons, giveaways and freebies on the web. The service feeds on the recent boom of frugality on the web by automatically aggregating posts from thousands of blogs specializing in deals, coupons, giveaways and freebies and organizing them is an easy-to-search directory.

GiveawayScout scans through thousands of partner frugal blogs, searching for relevant posts using natural language analysis. The posts are divided into categories such as apparel, food, gadgets etc. This scan is performed several times a day to make sure the information on the website is as fresh as possible. The service only scans blogs that have opted-in to be featured on the website.

Users of GiveawayScout can choose between several ways to stay updated. They can subscribe to email updates, install a widget to their iGoogle homepage or blog showing the latest posts or simply visit the site and use the text based search tool to find deals they are interested in. The service was founded by Israeli web entrepreneurs and is operated from Tel-Aviv Israel, targeting consumers and bloggers from the USA and Canada.
